Title: Requires that certain bids for state contracts contain a statement certifying that the bidder has not hired persons in this country illegally
Summary: Creates the statement of not hiring of persons in this country illegally which requires bidders for a state contract not hire persons in this country illegally under penalty of perjury.
LawCode: Add ยง148, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring that certain bids for state contracts contain a statement certifying that the bidder has not hired persons in this country illegally
